channel.title: Changing text colour in the text frame
channel.description:
On one server, quite a while ago, It was possible to change the text colour in the bottom frame, where chat and 'sendMessage' messages appear. Would anyone be able to tell me how to do this?
Thanks Krimson Eagl

item.title: Changing text colour in the text frame
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

yes just type green: or red: or any other colour you would like

Read full topic
item.source: Changing text colour in the text frame
